basic.Target Organism: [Ref.12054688] Gram-negetive bacteria:P.aeroginosa ATCC 15442 (MIC>150 μM), P.aeroginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=68.3 μM), E.coli CCT 1371 (MIC=3.4 μM), Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=6.8 μM), P. mirabilis (MIC>150 μM);Gram-positive bacteria:S.aureus ATCC 25293 (MIC=0.7 μM), S.aureus ATCC 6538 (MIC=3.4 μM), S.saprophyticus (MIC=0.7 μM), B.thuringensis (MIC=17.1 μM),  B.subtilis CCT 2471 (MIC=6.8μM).[Ref.28657596] Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=50μg/mL), B. cereus (MIC=100μg/mL);Gram-negative bacterium:S. typhimurium (MIC=100μg/mL), Escherichia coli (MIC=50μg/mL)
